meanings.definition: A person with whom one plays or spends time with for fun.
meanings.sent1: My little sister and I are best friends and playmates.
meanings.sent2: Children often enjoy having playmates to share toys and games with.
meanings.sent3: The two puppies became instant playmates and chased each other around the yard.
meanings.sent4: In the world of imagination, stuffed animals can become loyal playmates.
meanings.sent5: Growing up, my neighbors were my constant playmates, creating unforgettable memories together.

meanings.definition: A companion for play or recreation.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children searched for their playmates to join in the game.
meanings.sent2: Having a loyal pet as a playmate can bring joy and companionship.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten found a new playmate in the form of a bouncing ball.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the park served as a sturdy playmate for generations of children.
meanings.sent5: The friendly dolphin seemed to enjoy having the diver as a playmate in the water.
